contents.content: _{You may need to pick a subclass (bloodline, doctrine etc).}
_{Optionally, -2 in two abilities and +2 in one other.}
_{Two +2 from your background, one a free choice.}
_{Your proficiency bonuses at level 1 are: 0, 3, 5, 7 and 9. They increase as you level up.}
_{Gain proficiencies from your background and class.}
_{Become trained in a number of skills based on your class.}
_{If two sources give you training in the same skill, they don't add up. You may be able to spend the training elsewhere.}
_{May use 10 + proficiency bonus (inc level, but no other bonuses) rather than roll.}
contents.title: _{Assurance}

contents.content: _{Fly into a frenzy, gaining temporary hp and a bonus to damage but a penalty to AC.}
contents.title: [b]_{Rage!}[/b]

contents.content: _{Deduct hardness, then apply remaining damage to both shield and yourself.}
contents.title: _{Shield Block}

contents.content: _{Never flat-footed against creatures of a lower level.}
_{If you succeed at a melee Strike against a target with resistance against the physical damage type of the weapon or unarmed attack you’re using, reduce that resistance.}
_{1 minute, until combat ends, or until you fall unconscious.}
_{If using an agile weapon, rage damage bonus is halved.}
contents.title: _{Agile}

contents.content: _{Cannot use actions with the Concentrate trait, including cast spells with a verbal component, except for Seek}
contents.title: _{While raging}:

contents.content: _{Lose temporary hit points. You cannot rage again for 1 minute.}
contents.title: _{After raging}:

contents.content: _{Until the end of this turn, can use Concentrate actions, including cast spells with a verbal component}
_{Gain critical specialization for your melee weapon or unarmed attack.}
_{Use one of your rage actions as a free action.}
_{Don’t become fatigued after you stop raging. It still takes the normal amount of time before you can use Rage again.}
